author: fchrist
msg: STANBOL-272 Some changes to update framework release preparation. The top level POM needs to inherit from parent POM otherwise the release build is not successful.

author: elecharny
msg: Removed the Lookup bypass, replaced it with a direct call to nexus.lookup()

msg: DERBY-5488: Make setObject( int, BigInteger ) rely on the existing setObject( int, BigDecimal ) logic.
